CentOS

CentOS may be our “free linux” standard moving forward.

Build procedure for CentOS - Build server

  • Download the ISOs from here or any of the CentOS mirrors
  • ssh to the iLO as root
    ssh -i /prod/images/etc/iLO/hscroot hscroot@pablsv01rmb

    Passwordless from taitc118.And you get this prompt 

    User:hscroot logged-in to ILOM0SJLGP433.(10.32.10.58)
iLO  1.94 at 12:11:27 Mar 19 2009
Server Name: TAITC056
Server Power: On

</>hpiLO->
  • mount the ISO image. I had to use IP as the iLO probably did not have name servers configured to resolve any hostnames.
    cd /map1/oemhp_vm/cddr
set oemhp_image="http://10.32.51.118/isos/RHEL6.0-20100414.0-AP-i386-DVD1.iso"
set oemhp_boot=connect
  • Check
    </map1/oemhp_vm/cddr>hpiLO-> show
status=0
status_tag=COMMAND COMPLETED


/map1/oemhp_vm/cddr
  Targets
  Properties
    oemhp_image=http://10.32.51.118/isos/RHEL6.0-20100414.0-AP-i386-DVD1.iso
    oemhp_connect=Yes
    oemhp_boot=Always
    oemhp_wp=Yes
    oemhp_applet_connected=No
  Verbs
    cd version exit show
